sec.p: Y.S., S.C. and X.J. contributed equally to this work. S.C., Y.-G.Z. and Y.S. conceived of the study. Y.S. and S.C. prepared meteorological inputs. Y.S., S.C. and X.J. performed research and analyzed data; S.C., Y.S., X.J., Z.C. and Y.-G.Z. wrote the paper. All authors gave comments on the manuscript.
